General.Name: Astral Asia Bhd
General.Description: Astral Asia Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the cultivation of oil palm in Malaysia. It operates through Investment, Property Development and Construction, Plantation, and Trading segments. The company owns and manages oil palm estates that cover approximately 4,019 hectares of plantation in the state of Pahang Darul Makmur. It also sells fast-moving consumer goods and household products through e-commerce platform. In addition, the company is involved in civil engineering, building construction, and property development and investment activities. Astral Asia Berhad was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
